headline: A Look At Newmont (NEM) Valuation After Strong Multi‑Year Shareholder Returns
summary: Newmont (NEM) has drawn investor attention after recent share price moves, with the stock up about 44% over the past 3 months and roughly 23% year to date from its last close of $124.25. See our latest analysis for Newmont. While the 1-day share price return of 1.74% and 90-day share price return of 44.02% show strong recent momentum from the latest close at $124.25, the 1-year total shareholder return of 186.91% and 3-year total shareholder return of 210.91% suggest investors have already...
